profile:
Serving Toronto and the GTA , proudly ,with over 20 years experience on the business.
When you choose Santos Painting you're choosing for a quality job.
We take care of our customers like any other company and we really respect your home.
Our main goal and our number one rule is to make our customers happy and we'll go above and beyond to give the customer satisfaction that you deserve.
We are very proud in saying that we never had an unhappy customer till this day and we don't plan to start now.

***

We specialize in both Residential and Commercial Painting: Interior painting, Exterior painting, plaster repair, drywall repair and installation,condo painting, townhouse painting, stucco ceiling flattening,wallpaper removal, kitchen cabinet painting, kitchen cabinet spraying, staircase painting, staircase staining, exterior wood repair, aluminum siding painting, brick painting, deck staining, fence painting, interior caulking, storefront painting, office painting.

***

Contact us today to schedule an appointment. We're looking forward to give you the best paint job you can get.
specialities: Stucco removal,Staircase Piano Style,Exterior&Interior painting, drywall repair

profile:
At Five Star Painting, our mission is to help you transform your property through paint while delivering the very best in quality and customer service. Our goal is to help you create the space of your dreams. We do this by providing the very highest quality products and working directly with you to capture your vision. 

We strive for nothing less than 100% customer satisfaction.  With every project, we thoroughly prep and clean all surfaces prior to painting. Our painters work quickly, efficiently, and carefully to complete the job in a timely manner. Throughout the process, we remain in consistent communication with you to ensure that your expectations are not only met but exceeded.

Give us a call for a free paint estimate: 
(289)769-8747
